description: Time snapshot was taken, in Epoch milliseconds. Same across all rows and all tables in the snapshot, and uniquely defines a particular snapshot.
name: snapshot_timestamp
about_you
description: [DELETED] Was: User's description of their research background, experience and research interests.

name: area_of_research
description: User's research area of focus.

name: compliance_training_bypass_time
description:
Time Compliance Training administratively bypassed, or null if this requirement
was never bypassed for this user.

name: compliance_training_completion_time
description: Time Compliance Training completed, or null if never completed.

name: compliance_training_expiration_time
description: [DELETED] Was: Time User's compliance training will expire, or null if training not taken or if bypassed

name: contact_email
description: User's external email address on file.

name: creation_time
description: Timestamp of account creation.

name: current_position
description: [DELETED] Was: User's current role/position.

name: data_access_level
description:
[DELETED - use access_tier_short_names] Was: An indication of whether the user has completed the requirements for access to the
registered tier.

name: data_use_agreement_bypass_time
description:
Time an admin bypassed the DUCC requirement for this user, or null if that has not happened.
This value is reset to null if a user's bypassed status is revoked.

name: data_use_agreement_completion_time
description: Time user last completed DUCC

name: data_use_agreement_signed_version
description: Version of DUCC last signed by this user.

name: demographic_survey_completion_time
description: Timestamp for completion of Demographic Survey (if completed).

name: disabled
description: If true, this account has been disabled by an administrator (or potentially an automatic process).

name: era_commons_bypass_time
description: Time an administrator bypassed the ERA Commons requirement for this user.

name: era_commons_completion_time
description: Time user completed ERA Commons account link.

name: ras_login_gov_bypass_time
description: [DELETED] Was: Time an administrator bypassed the RAS Login.gov requirement for this user.

name: ras_login_gov_completion_time
description: [DELETED] Was: Time user completed the RAS Login.gov account link.

name: identity_bypass_time
description: Time an administrator bypassed the identity requirement for this user.

name: identity_completion_time
description: Time user completed the identity requirement.

name: identity_verification_system
description: The system that the user used to complete identity verification.

name: family_name
description: User last name (family name).

name: first_registration_completion_time
description: [DELETED] Was: Time user first completed registration.

name: registered_tier_first_enabled_time
description: The time at which this user's registered tier access was first granted, if ever. Note: expiration of access does not affect this field.

name: controlled_tier_first_enabled_time
description: The time at which this user's controlled tier access was first granted, if ever. Note: expiration of access does not affect this field.

name: first_sign_in_time
description: Time user first signed into the Workbench with a GSuite account.

name: free_tier_credits_limit_days_override
description: [DELETED] Was: Override value for the default free tier time limit (days).

name: free_tier_credits_limit_dollars_override
description: Override value for the default free tier spending limit (USD).

name: given_name
description: User first name (given name).

name: last_modified_time
description: Time of last modification to this user account.

name: professional_url
description: User's URL at primary place of work.

name: two_factor_auth_bypass_time
description:
Time an administrator bypassed the two-factor authentication requirement for this user,
or null if it has not been bypassed.

name: two_factor_auth_completion_time
description: Time user registered a two-factor authentication method satisfying the 2FA requirement.

name: user_id
description:
Unique integer ID for this user, as assigned in the main Application DB. Serves as a pseudo-
primary key in this table when combined with a snapshot_timestamp. BigQuery doesn't enforce
this uniqueness, though.

name: username
description:
User's GSuite username, including appropriate domain for this environment. Uniquely describes a
user account (but not constrained to be unique by BigQuery).

name: city
description: [DELETED] Was: User-reported city of residence.

name: country
description: [DELETED] Was: User-reported country of residence.

name: state
description: [DELETED] Was: User-reported state or province. Not guaranteed to match official abbreviations or spellings.

name: street_address_1
description: [DELETED] Was: First line of user-reported street address.

name: street_address_2
description: [DELETED] Was: Second line of user-reported street address.

name: zip_code
description: [DELETED] Was: Up to 10-digit zip code for user-reported street address.

name: institution_id
description:
Foreign key into institution table. Each user is only affiliated
with a single institution.

name: institutional_role_enum
description:
Description of the user's role at the institution they are
affiliated with. Selected from a list of predefined values. If "other", see institutional_role_other_text
for custom description.

name: institutional_role_other_text
description:
If the institutional_role_enum is "other", custom description
of this user's role in the institution.

name: degrees
description: List of user's degrees, comma-delimited if multiple answers were provided

name: races
description: User-reported race information, comma-delimited if multiple answers were provided

name: ethnicity
description: User-reported Ethnicity information

name: gender_identities
description: User-reported Gender Identity information, comma-delimited if multiple answers were provided

name: identifies_as_lgbtq
description: User-reported Identify as LGBTQ information, comma-delimited if multiple answers were provided"

name: lgbtq_identity
description: User-reported LGBTQ Identity information

name: sexes_at_birth
description: User-reported Sex at birth information, comma-delimited if multiple answers were provided

name: year_of_birth
description: User-reported Year of birth information

name: disability
description: User-reported Disability information

name: highest_education
description: User-reported HighestEducation information

name: access_tier_short_names
description: List of access tiers available to the user, comma-delimited if multiple
